summary: Turn your mobile device into a remote control for your hearing instruments!
comments: I have the Signia rechargable hearing aides They work great except for one major problem. They will not let me use my phone to make or receive calls or listen to music without an external speaker. I do have the speaker but it would be so much more convenient for direct connect to my Pixel phone. This app has not been updated in over two years. App will not let me raise volume in only one hearing aid at a time. Frustrated. Thank you Kristine Drumm

When I first got these hearing aids they I worked well. I just had to get used to them. The app that was put on when I first got them allowed me to change the volume separately for the left and right ear. Now the app appears to just change a general sound for both sides. And no you can't just change the volume and think it's going to be the same on each side because it isn't

10/18/2020, I've done everything Signia via email recommended and this app simple does not work. Had my hearing technician reset the app again and still the app will not work. The app simply does not work. It would be very professional of someone if you can get the app working correctly. Please advise what to do. I have a Samgung A50 phone. Thank you. 3/17/2020 Follow up, STIll not working. I followed your advice, didn't solve problem. I would appreciate some help.

bluetooth. compatible is only for iPhone which doesnt help android users. It shouldn't be hard to be able to have a bluetooth compatibility and in always on the phone and this would help out tremendously for the ones that actually prefer androids over iPhones. sorry but not many of us like iPhones as it is. I shouldn't have to buy another phone because of my hearing aids that I pay out of pocket for and have to pay out of pocket for an iPhone as well.

Switching from 1 to 2 is easy. Volume control also works well. Further control such as area covered is nonexistent. You can't direct the sound as you want and eliminate the extraneous sounds from all other sources. For me #1 is useless as it is ruined by any outside source. I find I am restricted to #2 solely. Big disappointment.

title: Rexton App
description:
The Rexton App enables users of Rexton hearing aids, purchased 2014 or later, to adapt these safely and conveniently to their individual requirements and to adjust and control them.
In addition, the Rexton App includes various services and functions that support or automatically take over the extended use of your hearing aids.

All features and services are subject to the following factors:
- brand, type and platform of the hearing aid
- specific functions supported by the hearing aid
- services offered by the brand or distributor
- country-specific availability of services


Basic functions of the Rexton App:
With the Rexton App the hearing aid wearer can use a smartphone to remote control the paired hearing aids. The Rexton App also offers a comfortable range of functions for simple devices in the entry-level segment, e.g.

- various listening programs
- tinnitus signal
- volume control
- sound balance


Hearing aid-dependent functions of the app:
Depending on the technical equipment of the hearing aids and depending on the default functions of the provider, the Rexton App allows the following functions to be controlled, like

- directional hearing
- separate adjustment of both hearing aids
- muting the hearing aids
- volume control
- motion sensor

... as well as displaying and setting the battery charge status, warning signals, device usage and statistics for user satisfaction


Services at a glance
The availability of the listed services and features depends on the make and model of the hearing aid, distribution channel, country / region and service package.



Hearing success lessons
In addition to the initial adjustment of the hearing aid, the examination of the settings for the hearing success of the patient is significantly important. Based on a questionnaire available in the Rexton App, the hearing aid wearer can also document and continuously check the status and success of his hearing success to his audiologist.
descriptionHTML:
The Rexton App enables users of Rexton hearing aids, purchased 2014 or later, to adapt these safely and conveniently to their individual requirements and to adjust and control them.
In addition, the Rexton App includes various services and functions that support or automatically take over the extended use of your hearing aids.

All features and services are subject to the following factors:
- brand, type and platform of the hearing aid
- specific functions supported by the hearing aid
- services offered by the brand or distributor
- country-specific availability of services


Basic functions of the Rexton App:
With the Rexton App the hearing aid wearer can use a smartphone to remote control the paired hearing aids. The Rexton App also offers a comfortable range of functions for simple devices in the entry-level segment, e.g.

- various listening programs
- tinnitus signal
- volume control
- sound balance


Hearing aid-dependent functions of the app:
Depending on the technical equipment of the hearing aids and depending on the default functions of the provider, the Rexton App allows the following functions to be controlled, like

- directional hearing
- separate adjustment of both hearing aids
- muting the hearing aids
- volume control
- motion sensor

... as well as displaying and setting the battery charge status, warning signals, device usage and statistics for user satisfaction


Services at a glance
The availability of the listed services and features depends on the make and model of the hearing aid, distribution channel, country / region and service package.



Hearing success lessons
In addition to the initial adjustment of the hearing aid, the examination of the settings for the hearing success of the patient is significantly important. Based on a questionnaire available in the Rexton App, the hearing aid wearer can also document and continuously check the status and success of his hearing success to his audiologist.
summary: Rexton - remote Control for your hearing aid
recentChanges:
- bug fixes
- updated information
comments: I've had these hearing aids 2 months, so far so good, using the app only shows me volume and direction, not how to correct the tinny buzz at times. I'll ask about it when I get them cleaned.
App worked okay but hearing aids keep dropping the programs. After a few reloads, the app wouldn't read the QR code so had to go back to hearing center for reload.
Useless. The battery function is awful. Can barely if at all hear the signal. No useful instructions.

This is the only Sivantos app I can get to work and pair with my aids. I just want to use it to check volume levels and battery status and it does that seemlessly for me. (Android 10 on Huawei device).

Not for newer Android phones it only supports up to s10 or note 8 while I have note 9 so the only way I was able to pair was through a qr code.Rexton need to upgrade the app for latest Android n Apple models.

title: Gentle Wakeup - Sleep & Alarm Clock with Sunrise
description:
Wake up gently and relaxed every day
Slowly increasing light and sound in the morning will help you out of any deep sleep and let your body prepare for waking up.

Fall asleep faster
Slowly decreasing light and natural sound in the evening will lull you to sleep. A sleep aid slows down your breathe.

Sleep better through the night
Soothing sounds from nature or home at a low volume will help you to stay asleep.

Features: 
✓ Alarm clock: Fully functional free alarm clock with repeat alarms and snooze function.
✓ True sunrise: The device changes colors from red to yellow like a real sunrise.
✓ Gentle sounds: Wake up with different natural sounds, instrumental music or your own favorite sounds.
✓ Big nightstand clock: A sleep clock that shows digital time and wake up time at night and can play sleep music to help you get to sleep faster.
✓ Power napping: Take a power nap during the day and wake up refreshed and with new energy after 20 min.
✓ Sleep timer: Easily fall asleep in the evening with a sunset and decreasingly gentle sounds (ASMR).
✓ Sleep aid: Helps to slow down your breathing to get you asleep faster and more relaxed. Set timer for the speed that you wish to decrease from.
✓ Sleeping sounds: Sleep better with background sounds! Choose from sounds like rain, wind, crickets or white noise. It also supports all sleep cycles like light sleep, deep sleep and REM sleep.
✓ Weather and clothes: The weather forecast with clothing symbols that always recommends the right clothing for today\'s weather. For rain, snow, sun and hot or cold – this app will recommend the right clothes to wear.
✓ Beautiful Countdowns:Count the number of days, weeks, and even minutes until your next holiday, birthday party or any other event you need to remember. Choose from over 100 beautifully designed counters and share them with your friends.
✓ Brightness adjustment: Brightness is smartly adjusted to not blind you in the night.
✓ Individual wake up: Get woken up without disturbing your partner.
✓ Easy and intuitive: All main features can be accessed by icons directly on the main screen.
✓ Soft torch light: Use the soft light to find something in the night without waking up anyone else while you find what you need.
✓ Portrait and landscape: Your device can be placed in portrait or landscape mode on your nightstand or bedside table.
✓ Autostart: The app can start automatically even if you close it. No additional battery consumption.
✓ Skip next alarm: Skip a repeating alarm in case you need to wake up earlier. Now you will be at no risk of forgetting to turn alarm on again.
✓ Custom repeat options: Repeat alarms every second monday, every second day or set specific calendar days to coincide with you work shifts.
✓ Guided Meditation: Fall asleep with guided relaxation and guided sleep meditation (english). Wake up with mindfulness.

Permissions: http://bit.ly/2oWzYDS

Prevent sleep disorders
Gentle sleep sounds and light may help with sleeping disorders caused by any cause such as: stress, jet lag, depression, migraine, headache, motivation, tinnitus, insomnia, burn-out, autism, PTSD, anxiety disorder, ADHD, mental disorder. Please note that the app is not a medical product and sleep disorders should always be diagnosed by a doctor. But it may help you to sleep without having to use sleeping pills.

You will have complete control over the wake up process
Start the sunrise 20 minutes before your desired wake-up time and define your wanted brightness level at the end of the alarm. Slowly increase the volume of  the sound of birds twittering and add a device vibration as a backup 5 min after wake up time. Enjoy a nice morning summary including weather forecast before you get out of bed.

Start waking up with increasing light and you will never want to wake up by harsh sounds again.

comments: Definitely what I needed. Waking up to this alarm is alot easier than hitting snooze several times before actually getting out of bed. Using this I'm actually fully awake by the time I set my alarm to get out of bed. The interface seems strange to me, but there is a video when u first open it to show you how to use it.

Tried this for a week and there are too many bells and whistles for me. I'm just looking for calm alarm tones so I don't wake up miserable in this hellhole of 2020. Also, while I get ads, a whole page Facebook ad as soon as you wake up is the opposite of calm. Also, it doesn't save settings easily, so if I go in to change the time of an alarm, I have to also set every little thing back to my liking. Too much for me,but clearly works for others so give it a try to see if it fits.

Exactly what ive been looking for One problem though is that, whenever my phone is below 20%, the no-sound, light-only alarm i set up at sunrise sounds VERY loudly. I use an old phone as alarm clock so its battery sometimes drains. I'd like for it to simply not ring and let the battery empty (like, make it be my choice)

Mornings are so much easier! I'm not hitting snooze AT ALL. I can't imagine waking up to a shocking, obtrusive alarm sound ever again. I have recommended it to coworkers and friends. Why isn't everyone using this alarm??? Great app, thanks Gentle Wakeup!
Has helped curve my terrible snooze habit, and waking up is definitely a better experience. Bought all the features, just for liking the free version so much.

title: Healing nature sounds - for comfortable sleep -
description:
You can relax both physically and mentally with the soothing environmental sound and gentle music.
High-quality nature sounds, such as the sound of coastal waves, the sound of bonfires, and the sound of mountain birds, alleviate daily stress, anxiety, and tinnitus, and induce deep sleep.
Get good quality sleep from babies to adults.

This app can reproduce more than 100 different nature environments along seven themes of night, water, rain, spring, summer, autumn and winter.
Since the volume can be adjusted for nature sounds and music, you can create your own ideal sound.

It works in the background, so it's useful when sleeping or doing other tasks.
In addition, there is a sleep timer, so it is convenient when you sleep while being healed!


# Major features #
- More than 100 high quality nature sounds along 7 themes
- 38 kinds of healing music
- Create your favorite list with your favorite nature sounds
- Ambient sound and music volume can be set individually
- Automatic silence by sleep timer function
- Can be used offline
- Can be used in the background
- Beautiful background photos


# Recommended for such people #
- If you have trouble sleeping
- If your baby can't stop crying
- For those who want to relieve stress and refresh their mood
- Those who want the sounds that does not disturb while studying or working
- Those who want the sounds used during yoga and meditation

title: White Noise Airplane White Noise Plane Sleep Sound
description:
Listen to White Noise Airplane White Noise Plane Sleep Sound  to study and work more during the day or get to sleep faster and have better sleep quality.
All you need is White Noise Airplane White Noise Plane Sleep Sound, our free application to focus and sleep.
White noise for study and concentration

What is White Noise?
White Noise is a combination of various frequencies that our ear can actually recognize and hear. Since it isn’t feasible to synthesize all the sounds in one, white noise is actually the signal created when several frequencies are combined.
 
Makes babies feel relaxed - White noise for baby sleep
Babies are no stranger to white noise. They were already exposed to it while they were in the womb of their mothers. If your baby tends to wake up with the slightest noise, introducing white noise may help them sleep longer even when there are other sounds at play. Enjoy White noise baby sleep sounds
 
Masks tinnitus 
White noise may actually help mask the sound of tinnitus or the ringing in your ear. Those who have tinnitus sometimes find that playing white noise helps them fall asleep better at night.

😊Benefits of White Noise
- Increased focus on your tasks
- Achieve peacefulness of body and mind.
- Effective assistance to sleep, cure for insomnia
- 🛌Better sleep
- Relief for stress and anxiety
- Excellent for meditation and relaxation
- Increased awareness and concentration
- Tinnitus calmer
- Pacification of babies👶 and toddlers

descriptionHTML:
Listen to White Noise Airplane White Noise Plane Sleep Sound to study and work more during the day or get to sleep faster and have better sleep quality.
All you need is White Noise Airplane White Noise Plane Sleep Sound, our free application to focus and sleep.
White noise for study and concentration

What is White Noise?
White Noise is a combination of various frequencies that our ear can actually recognize and hear. Since it isn’t feasible to synthesize all the sounds in one, white noise is actually the signal created when several frequencies are combined.

Makes babies feel relaxed - White noise for baby sleep
Babies are no stranger to white noise. They were already exposed to it while they were in the womb of their mothers. If your baby tends to wake up with the slightest noise, introducing white noise may help them sleep longer even when there are other sounds at play. Enjoy White noise baby sleep sounds

Masks tinnitus
White noise may actually help mask the sound of tinnitus or the ringing in your ear. Those who have tinnitus sometimes find that playing white noise helps them fall asleep better at night.

😊Benefits of White Noise
- Increased focus on your tasks
- Achieve peacefulness of body and mind.
- Effective assistance to sleep, cure for insomnia
- 🛌Better sleep
- Relief for stress and anxiety
- Excellent for meditation and relaxation
- Increased awareness and concentration
- Tinnitus calmer
- Pacification of babies👶 and toddlers
- white noise for study offline, white noise for sleep offline, white noise meditation, Asmr for sleep

Features of the app Serene sleep white noise
- Listen with your screen blocked
- 🕑 White Noise with Timer: At the end of the timer, all sounds will end
- ⏰White Noise Alarm Clock sounds peaceful
- Audio downloads
- Audio only mode
- Volume control
- White noise app offline: Click on the REC button, and download your favorite audios, you will find them in your Recordings.
Listen White noise and deep sleep without needing a connection

title: Relaxing ambient sounds
description:
Relaxing ambient sounds and healing music will help you relax your body and mind.
The high quality ambient sounds, such as the sound of waves on the beach, the sound of bonfires, and the sounds of wild birds, will reduce the stress, anxiety, and tinnitus of daily life. Helps to relieve and relax.
Recommend it when you can't sleep, when you want to concentrate on your work or study, or when you want to calm yourself down and reduce stress.

This app can be used for nature sounds such as the sound of rain and wind, as well as the sound of a car engine, wind chimes and washing machine. Many unique sounds are included.
You can play back any combination of your favorite sounds.
You can also adjust the volume of each one, so you can create the ideal environmental sound of your choice.


# Features #
- High quality environmental sounds in five thematic areas: nature, water, animal, life, and other sounds
- 20 types of healing music
- Playback of environmental sounds in any combination
- Save environmental sound combinations as favorites
- Separate volume settings for ambient sound and music
- Automatic mute by sleep timer function
- Can be used offline
- Can be used in the background


# Recommended for such people #
- If you have trouble sleeping
- If your baby can't stop crying
- For those who want to relieve stress and refresh their mood
- Those who want the sounds that does not disturb while studying or working
- Those who want the sounds used during yoga and meditation

title: White Noise for Calm:Sleep Nature Sound
description:
White noise has over 30 high-quality natural and artificial sounds for relaxation or get yourself or your baby to sleep.
Personalized white noise, sleep sounds and meditation music, ideal for relaxing, sleeping, meditation and concentration.
The most effective & high-quality sleep app.
Benefits:
• Helps you sleep by blocking distractions
• Relaxes and reduces stress
• Pacifies fussy and crying babies
• Increases focus 
• Soothes headaches and migraines
• Masks tinnitus (ringing of the ears) 
Best Features:
- 30+ Single Sounds
* Ocean sounds, river, drip, sound of rain on the roof, heavy rain, thunder, sounds of cracking fire, burning torches, flames, wind, walk in the snow, night of meadow, owls, frogs, crickets, birds singing, lullaby music for baby sleep.
- Unlimited Mix Sounds
* You can customize your own favorite sounds, by mixing at most 6 of the default relaxing sounds in one white noise, thus creating unlimited & personalized relaxing sounds.
- High quality soothing sounds
* We have carefully picked sounds of the nature that are great for relaxation or sleeping.
- Stop Timer
* You can set a timer and turn off the screen. When the time is up, the sound fades gently and the application closes by itself. 
- Background audio
* Support works in the background so you can use other apps while listening
- Simple and beautiful design 
Download and enjoy the nature sounds for great sleeping!

title: Calm Radio Android TV - Relaxing Music
description:
The New York Times calls Eckhart Tolle “the most popular spiritual author in the US.”
We call him one of our most loyal listeners.
“I very much enjoy listening to Calm Radio. It’s my favourite station,” says the best-selling author of The Power of Now.

~ “A must-have! A huge array of 400 HD channels, great playlists, and most customizable ambient sounds.” Jeff Rose
~ “The best music app ever! Whatever the mood, I can find it on this app. Great Stuff!!”. Moggleman Dec 2018

With over 400 HD audio channels, Calm Radio is the #1 and world's largest streaming service of sleep music, meditation music, relaxation music, and nature sounds and ASMR.

Calm Radio is also the #1 and world’s most channels of classical music channels like Mozart, Bach, Symphonies, Sonatas, Choirs ... more.

NEW! Guided Sleep and Sleep Music channels available in lengths of 60 minutes to 8 hours.
NEW! Guided Meditation. Available in male and female versions in lengths of 5 minutes to 1 hour.
NEW! Downloadable meditation and sleep channels.

Calm Radio features more exclusive and unique playlists for Mindfulness Music, dozens of binaural frequency and solfeggio frequency channels that are recommended for Wellness, Self Health and Mindfulness.

Calm Radio’s Nature Sounds and White Noise channels are recommended by audiologists for the treatment of Tinnitus and ringing-in-the-ears.

NEW! Enhance your audio experience with beautiful scenic nature videos, like forests, waterfalls and seascapes.

MEMBER FEATURES
Premium members enjoy over 400 HD audio channels, ad-free.
Free basic membership listeners can enjoy over 200 channels with ads.

√ Read our listener feedback

**** You amaze me! You keep finding ways to improve. I love the many new channels. Eric Harry & Calm Radio you just keep getting better! I think this is the first time I've ever written two letters of appreciation to a company. Thanks! Maggie A.

title: Deep Sleep: White Noise, Sleep sounds, Meditation
description:
Sleep at the push of a button! Fall asleep fast, stay asleep & wake up refreshed! Deep Sleep is designed to be the most efficient Sleep-Aid App to make you fall asleep in 60 seconds quickly. Relax, take a deep breath and join us on a restful journey to sleep!

Deep Sleep brings great collection of HD sounds that can be mixed into the perfect relaxing ambiences. You can choose from different types of rain, nature sounds, city sounds, white noise or instruments. Save your favorite sound mixes so they are always by hand with you. Understand your sleep patterns means you can wake up feeling refreshed and ready to start your day.

🌖 Deep Sleep INCLUDES:
- Hypnotic stories and natural sounds that can improve your nightly routine
- Three scientific breathing methods to help you release stress
- Simple page design and elegant natural scenes give you clean experience
- Clear background pictures are paired with each recording can create immersive atmosphere
- Automatic music turn-off button, so it won't disturb your deep sleep

title: Tone Pool
description:
Tone Pool is a meditative water sculpture made of healing stones. It features floating singing bowls which make beautiful sounds as they interact with each other. Change the water current to customize the frequency and character of bowl sounds. Add soothing background sounds to complete your 'Tone Poem'.

Features (free version):

• 2 Preset Tone Poems (Custom combinations of singing bowls and ambient soundscapes designed for specific activities)
• Create your own Tone Poems by blending singing bowls, ambient soundscapes, and healing stones (Limited options in free version)
• Share Tone Poems with friends via text or email
• Adjust the water current to customize the experience for relaxation, focus, or activation
• Adjust the audio volume of the bowls and background ambience

Features (unlocked version):

• 34 Singing Bowls to choose from, including Crystal and Tibetan
• 8 Ambient sounds, including ASMR, Tinnitus Mask, and Binaural Beats
• 8 Beautiful Healing Stone Pools
• 8 Preset Tone Poems designed for a variety of activities
• Timer for sleep, meditation, yoga, or other activities
• Create and Save an unlimited number of Tone Poems
• Share Tone Poems with friends via text or email
• Open an unlimited number of Tone Poems created by friends or posted on social media
• Adjust the water current to customize the the experience for relaxation, focus, or activation
• Adjust the audio volume of the bowls and background ambience

recentChanges: You can post Tone Poems directly to Facebook or load them from Facebook with just one click. You can also share them from within the app using text or email.
comments: This was the very 1st app I ever spent money on...and it has helped make meditating and finding calm a part of my days every week. I love that I can create my own tones mix my own sound therapy and share it. This was a creative invention and a meaningful app. Thanks for the amazing creation, it has brought me a lot of peace

This is a really neat app. I wasn't sure how the bowls worked at first. I really like the ability to have multiple toned bowls in the pool and be able to choose the background ambiance, water motion and the pool material itself is really cool. I do however suggest maybe some decor like zen items (stacked rocks, bamboo, flowers, etc) in the background or on the rim of the pool to add more immersion, as well as maybe some backdrops. Other than thst I find this app really peaceful. :)

Love this app during lunch at work to make the boss less so. Tried to use it at bedtime, but fell asleep so fast I had no time to enjoy it. The preset poems are wonderfully creative and inspired me to attempt creating my own. I can see a long interactive relationship with this app and out of the box it is fully functional and masterfully designed

Soo nice. I really think this is going to be popular with meditators, the tones are beautiul and the pool is as well. The different gems for the pools is ingenious. I think more work could be done on the ambient part of the ap but good work! I love it!
Just downloaded. To unlock all so I can share was extremely reasonably priced. Creating my own calm relaxing tone pool is Awesome! Try the free version to see how simple and relaxing you feel too!

title: Tinytus
description:
Dedicated application to the symptomatic treatment of tinnitus.

It is based on the use of a stereo noise generator:
  - Brown
  - Pink
  - White
  - Blue
  - Violet
  - Grey

This noise can have a basic
  - Natural: use of ambiant noise via the microphone of the device
  - Virtual: synthesization of the noise.

It is possible to apply a different sound to each ear so best to treat tinnitus.Similarly, the volume is in differential setting, whether one for the left channel and one for the right channel.

A "ocean" effect allows you to vary the volume to the rhythm of the waves.

The "menu" button on your device allows you to have direct access to the user manual.

comments: This app just wasn't for me but the actual app was great it had so many options for sounds and volume. This will definitely work for most people but it wasn't for me (this was not the apps fault and i appreciate the effort that was put in to making this)

Definetely not for Huawei users. When the app is opened, the navigation buttons do not appear and there is no way to get out of the app. Instead of the navigation buttons, you get a Google ads bar and when you tap on it too se of the buttons appear, it just opens a Google page. The most annoying thing ever.

This app is amazing especially for headphone users, the mixture of "white noise" you can make is astonishing. The developers are also extremely supportive, I contacted them about an issue with it crashing after the startup logo and it was fixed later that afternoon, stellar work!

Similar to other feedback, UI could use some work. The banner ad down the bottom completely covers controls, and when you lock your phone the audio stops. For this reason I can't use, and have uninstalled.

Some lovley sounds but drain your phone battery. Before I went to sleep it was 100% and then, the next morning my phone was dead. Starts off nice but ends a bit rubbish. Plug your phone in if you are going to use this app over night.

title: Sleep Cycle: Sleep analysis & Smart alarm clock
description:
Relax, sleep better and wake up feeling rested with Sleep Cycle, the smart alarm clock. Track sleep from bedtime to morning, and get detailed analysis with the app that makes waking up in the morning just that bit easier. 

Track sleep using your phone and start your day feeling energized with our intelligent alarm clock and sleep tracker. Its unique design only wakes you up while you’re in your light sleep phase. Plus, you’ll get detailed reports as Sleep Cycle monitors your sleep patterns, from bedtime until you're waking up. Track sleep and use the data to help you sleep better today! 

⏰ Waking up made easy - 5 reasons you’ll love Sleep Cycle:

1. Sleep better with a gentle wake up call - Sleep Cycle’s alarm clock wakes you up while you’re in light sleep and is a natural way to start your day.
2. Relax at bedtime and track sleep easily - Learn about your sleep patterns with detailed analysis. 
3. A sleep tracker with a difference - There’s no phone under your pillow, you can track sleep by placing your device on the nightstand or close by on the floor. 
4. Your health comes first - Your sleep data and reports will help you feel great inside and out. 
5. Sleep better - Relax and let Sleep Cycle analyse your light sleep, deep sleep and overall health.

Relax with a good night’s sleep that will do wonders for your health. 

Download Sleep Cycle today - waking up in the morning has never been easier! 

Free features

√ Sleep analysis with Sleep Cycle patented sound technology, or accelerometer
√ Detailed sleep statistics and daily sleep graphs
√ Carefully selected alarm melodies
√ Snooze by shaking or double tapping the phone lightly
√ Customizable wake-up window. From instant (regular alarm clock), up to 90 minutes

Premium features

√ Longterm sleep tracker trends
√ Compare your sleep data to world sleep statistics • Snore trends - view historical snore trends data
√ Sleep aid - helps you fall asleep easier
√ Sleep notes - see how events such as drinking coffee, stress, working out, or eating late affect your sleep quality
√ Wake up mood - see how Sleep Cycle affects your wake up mood
√ Online backup - lets you secure your sleep data online
√ Export sleep data to Excel for detailed analysis


REQUIREMENTS
Ability to charge your phone by the bed.
Ability to place your phone near the bed, such as on a nightstand table or on the floor.

recentChanges: Bug fixes and improvements.
comments: I love the sleep tracker feature on this! I upgraded just to accurately record my sleep and it has improved over time. One feature I wish it could do in the tracker is combine different sleep sessions in same day. For example, I like to take a 30min nap during lunch break. Sometimes at night, I am woken up to take dog out, or use the facilities. When I stop and restart it, it only records the most recent session.

Doesn't always record analysis. Some mornings you turn the alarm off (the alarm that is part of this app) and it simply does nothing instead of displaying your sleep record. It seems random as to when it works. In particular when you turn the alarm off and it goes to snooze (another glitch) it fails to record.

I benefited from this app a few years ago and need to do this again. Why did it switch from accelerometer to microphone? How will it know if I've stopped breathing or just changed sides? The accelerometer was way cool.

The microphone tracking is a great idea and seems well implemented, but there are two issues that baffle me that are easily fixed: 1) I often wake up early and want to know if I've gotten enough sleep. Show me. Why make me remember what time I went to bed and calculate? 2) It knows when I'm awake or asleep based on the microphone data so why doesn't it subtract out the time I was not sleeping? "In bed" time should be a second, less-important metric. Time actually asleep is more important.

It works. Its got a well designed UX. It really helps people with disorders such as ADHD where following a regular routine is important, but regular alarms are too discordant. I like the fact that the upgrade screen is at the beginning. The design is Honest. So all in all, well done.

title: Safe Headphones - Hear Background Noises
description:
Note: Audio Recording Permission is required to Capture Background Noises.

Note: Using this as a spy app to listen to other's conversations may cause you legal trouble. This app is designed only to be used for safety purposes only.

This app will turn your Headphones into Noise Un-Cancelling Headphones which will allow you to hear background noises and Car Horns while listening to Music. Now you can use your headphones in public places without worrying about safety. This app can also be used as a hearing aid if anyone with hearing loss

This app works like Quick Ambient Mode in Galaxy Buds where you can briefly hear your surroundings without turning the music off completely.

This app also improves your hearing ability to hear audible sounds more clear and loud directly into your ears. All you have to do is to plug headphones to your device and switch on the button. You can put the device closer to the person or audio source you want to listen louder while putting headphones in your ear.

You can listen to whatever you want to listen to using this app. Even if you want to hear something from a relatively large distance like from another room you can use Bluetooth headphones or earpiece and place the device safely near the place of conversation or audio source. This app can turn your device into a powerful listening device and turn your normal ear into a miracle ear anyone wants to have.

You can use this app in a number of ways. You can listen to lectures better from back seats. You can listen to TV programs better from a distance. All this app is going to do for you is to collect the sound from the device's microphone and then pass it to the headphones after the sound amplifier in the app amplifies the sound collected from the microphone.

Key Features:

* Improves your hearing by amplifying sound from surrounding

* Can hear audible sounds loud and clear

* Can control the volume of sounds and voices with the volume control at the bottom

* Can also control the volume of playing sound with the device's volume control buttons

* Beautiful UI based on Google's Material Design UI

1. Changed about screen
comments: Juat trying it out but I know having audio on blast while talking to someone and/or walking around traffic is something that irritates or endangers yourself. Having an app that keeps you connected with the world is something that might save my life and will keep me in tune with my surrounding environment. So far I'm able to listen to my music and hear someone speak to me. It picks up on things as small as my breathing and relays it through my earbuds so I can listen to my music and hear someone.

This app works amazingly well. It seriously kills all background noises completely & allows me to hear other sounds. Very impressive. Only downside which is the only reason why I didn't give it 5 stars is the fact that you can NOT turn it off at all. Exiting the app won't do it, closing the app won't bit even killing the app. Literally the only way to turn it off is to uninstall it & then I have to reinstall it again when I want to use it again. Please fix this please thank you

This is good but is missing a killer feature, boost mode. If I wanted to I could use this as a hearing aid, but only with the current settings set to their absolute maximum. The option to go even higher would allow one to use this app to help with hearing in a pinch. Haven't seen an app with latency this low on the store.

I was almost disappointed that I couldn't find any app that can produce ambient sound since the one that came with my A7 doesn't work with my ear buds and boom! I found this. This is almost close to the real thing. However a boost to volumes would be nice also, add the Bluetooth microphone options and make the sound match the frequency of it's recoding. Thank you for such amazing app.

Does as advertised, lets u hear surrounding sounds while listening to music on your headphones/earpiece. There is gain control to regulate amount of background noise you hear which is nice. Only gripe is that the app uses the phone mic as opposed to the Wired/Bluetooth earpiece mic, rendering it useless if i want to be able to hear ambient sound while on the go while listening to music at the same time.

title: Relaxing Night Nature Sounds Offline: Calm & Sleep
description:
High-quality hand-picked nature sounds gives a great experience of relaxation. You can mix various sounds to get your desired relaxing atmosphere. This app can be used for relaxing, studying, reading , sleeping.

Night Animal Sounds
In the countryside, there are some insects & animal like Owl, Crickets, Grasshopper, Fox and some more that makes a nice sound at night. If you struggle with insomnia, you’re trying to sleep in quickly, these sounds help you nod off more easily. 

Lullaby Sounds
Lullaby sound helps your baby to sleep peacefully or block out unwanted noise, and go to sleep faster. The sound will loop automatically and close after the scheduled time.

Rain Sounds
Many of us like rain sounds a lot. This app has many types of rain sound, such as Rain on Lake, Rain on Roof, Rain on Window and more, which will help you to sleep early.

Ocean Sounds
Ocean waves are a popular choice for soothing sleep sounds. For many people, the rhythmic crashing of water onto the sand and rock can be meditative. In this app there are many types of ocean sounds like Wave, Seagull, Sailboat and more. 

Forest Sounds
Suppose you lost in the forest, you are in the sound of the birds, waterfall, brooks and many more. You also get the experience of the environment of the forest at night. 

It has the easiest way to set timers and so much more.

- Favorite Items
- Perfect Timer
- Relax Sounds
- Nature Sounds
- Rain Sounds
- Ocean Sounds
- Wind & fire
- Sleep Better
- Meditation
- concentration
- Reading

recentChanges: Minor bug fix
comments: "offline" is in the title, and it truly is. I turned off wifi & data signal & it still works. The sounds are fantastically real, even for coming through a tiny cell phone speaker. No need to sign up, make an account, or purchase anything. As far as ads go, just turn off your screen. Actually & truly free.

Great soothing noise selection - but shuts off randomly. If you need it to be on all night while you sleep, this is not for you. I am a light sleeper, and work opposite schedule from my housemate. Having a continuous sound is what helps my brain relax and sleep, but having it suddenly cut off actually wakes me up from deep sleep. Love this app but can't use it. It doesn't keep doing its one job, and the sudden stops trigger anxiety. Oh well.

Nice! The sounds are quite good. I esp. like the rhythmic "Wave Crush" (you probably meant "Wave Crash" tho, right?). There are so many nature-sound apps—some, with only ocean sounds—but the waves are almost always constant rather than rhythmic, which is so much more relaxing. Suggestion: It feels jarring how the whole screen moves when you select a sound. How about putting the empty rows at the top and adding sounds there, so everything else doesn't have to jump around?

very calming and helps me with my anxiety, even when im not sleeping :). i really love the addition of sounds that arent entirely natural, like the gentle whir of the fan or the train. id love for an ambient chatter sound, too. the nature sounds are a bit repetitive, though, and could use more variation and spacing out. overall, cute and gets the job done.

The best app I have found to create an individualised combination of nature sounds thats just right. This app gives you lots of choices and so much control its a perfect mindfulness relaxation backdrop.

title: Sonic SoundLink 2
description:
The Sonic SoundLink 2 app works with all Sonic wireless hearing aids with 2.4 GHz technology.

The Sonic SoundLink 2 app enables you to control your hearing aids, choose what you want to hear, and adjust the sound.

The app offers a “Find my hearing aid” search feature, links to user instructions, and low battery notification.

The Sonic SoundLink 2 app is also used to connect users to the Sonic service on IFTTT.

Other features:
- Select from which of your TV-Adapters you want to stream the signal to your hearing aids 
- Support for remote/partner microphone via SoundClip-A
- Advice on coping with hearing loss
- Connect your hearing aids to other devices and web services via Sonic IFTTT service.
- Individual volume Left & Right
- Control of tinnitus relief sounds (if supported by hearing aid)

For more information, you can access instructions on how to use this app in the application settings.

We recommend the following devices with Android 8.0 or later.

recentChanges:
The Sonic SoundLink2 app has been updated!
We’ve listened to your feedback and added new features, including:
• In case of pairing to several TV-Adapters selection from which to stream
• Use of Apple ID to login to IFTTT services.
• New Sonic IFTTT service.
• Small improvements and bug fixes.

We hope that you will like the changes. Thank you for using our app!
comments: This is my updated review 7/31/2020. I have increased a star. The app is user friendly and easy to use. It is so nice to be able to use my aids as buds. I like the drop down menu to change volume/mode of hearing instead of having to go into the app itself when watching YouTube etc. It does not randomly disconnect as much anymore. I rarely use this app for calls. Battery life is not great 2 to 3 days but that changed after custom molds I was getting 4 to 5 days.

I'm new to hearing aids as of Friday 1/3/2020 and this app. This app was suggested by my audiologist. My list of cons are below for this app. 1. Burns my Motorola Z Force 3 battery down and fast. 2. Really, really wish that I could stream music and link phone calls and texts through my hearing aids which is a big plus with me. 3. Whatever Apple users can do on their cell phones, tablets and iPods, Android users should be able to do the same.

Sure would be nice to be able to answer phone calls through the app. Even just to hear the phone ring would be really nice without having to send more money on a device to connect the two together. When using to control the volume I have to remember if I want to adjust the right side to use the left side of the the phone. The left is the right and the right is the left.

Newest update has screwed everything up. Woke up the other day to find out there's a new update. Now my hearing aids spontaneously disconnect, won't reconnect, won't respond to volume control, and takes forever connect hearing aids when batteries aee changed. Why can't we do everything that Apple users can do. I want to stream music and answer phone calls through my hearing aids.

I would like to see additional functionality for android phones, linking cell phone for calls and streaming media. Similar to what is in the apple app. The functions I have now are pretty much limited to adjusting volume and battery level. UPDATE After using the app for a while, it needs a major overhaul. It randomly disconnects from one or both hearing aids, can't connect at all and I have to restart both aids and the app more than once to get the connection back.

title: White Noise Train Sleep Sounds
description:
Listen to White Noise Train Sleep Sounds  to study and work more during the day or get to sleep faster and have better sleep quality.
All you need is White Noise Train Sleep Sounds, our free application to focus and sleep.
White noise for study and concentration

What is White Noise?
White Noise is a combination of various frequencies that our ear can actually recognize and hear. Since it isn’t feasible to synthesize all the sounds in one, white noise is actually the signal created when several frequencies are combined.
 
Makes babies feel relaxed - White noise for baby sleep
Babies are no stranger to white noise. They were already exposed to it while they were in the womb of their mothers. If your baby tends to wake up with the slightest noise, introducing white noise may help them sleep longer even when there are other sounds at play. Enjoy White noise baby sleep sounds
 
Masks tinnitus 
White noise may actually help mask the sound of tinnitus or the ringing in your ear. Those who have tinnitus sometimes find that playing white noise helps them fall asleep better at night.

😊Benefits of White Noise
- Increased focus on your tasks
- Achieve peacefulness of body and mind.
- Effective assistance to sleep, cure for insomnia
- 🛌Better sleep
- Relief for stress and anxiety
- Excellent for meditation and relaxation
- Increased awareness and concentration
- Tinnitus calmer
- Pacification of babies👶 and toddlers
- white noise for study offline, white noise for sleep offline, white noise meditation, Asmr for sleep

Features of the app Serene sleep white noise
- Listen with your screen blocked
- 🕑 White Noise with Timer: At the end of the timer, all sounds will end
- ⏰White Noise Alarm Clock sounds peaceful
- Audio downloads
- Audio only mode
- Volume control
- White noise app offline: Click on the REC button, and download your favorite audios, you will find them in your Recordings.
Listen White noise and deep sleep without needing a connection

comments: I like to travel by train, it makes me sleepy, so it's an excellent soothing sound. The infinite mode is missing.
Won't work without internet.
its very peacful.im loving it..just wish a little louder but its great!!!! im so happy you raised volume!! its such a cool app.i feel like im on the trains.being a hobo :)
No internet = no sound Sorry no reason a sound app needs to be spying on me.
Perfect 👌

title: June's Journey - Hidden Objects
description:
Nothing like a mystery! 

Find the hidden objects to crack every case. Solve mind teasing mysteries in the glamorous 1920s! 
Dive into June Parker's captivating quest to unveil a scandalous family secret. Escape to an era of opulent mansions and romance as you search for hidden clues through hundreds of stunning mind-teasing puzzles! 

* ARE YOU READY FOR THE JOURNEY OF A LIFETIME?* 

⭐KEEN-EYED DETECTIVES WANTED – Engage your sense of observation to find all hidden clues 

⭐YOUR 1ST CLASS TICKET TO THRILLS – Mystery! Danger! Romance! Where will each new chapter take you? 

⭐MYSTERY WITH ADDED GLAMOUR – Relax through hundreds of dazzling hidden-object scenes and customize your very own luxurious mansion and garden island 

⭐25 MILLION FANS ALREADY LOVE IT – Don't miss out on the latest hit from the makers of the mythical hidden object classic "Pearl's Peril" 

⭐ ALL-NEW EPISODES – Just like your favorite TV series, look forward to a new mystery in each new chapter, and a new chapter every week 

--------------------------------------------------------------- 

June’s Journey is free to download and play, but it also allows you to purchase virtual items with real money inside the game, for instance to upgrade your mansion. You can disable in-app purchases in your device’s settings. You may require an Internet connection to play June’s Journey and access its social features. June’s Journey may also contain advertising. 

Terms of Use: https://www.wooga.com/terms-of-service/ 
Privacy Policy: http://www.wooga.com/legal/privacy-policy/ 
Visit us at http://wooga.com 
Follow us on: facebook.com/JunesJourney

recentChanges:
Play our Trick-or-Treat events and enjoy the Halloween “spirit” with June in style. Don’t get spooked - we need keen-eyed Detectives like you on the job!

VOLUME 4 CHAPTER 3 - "Covert Operations" is next up for you to tackle! The team works hard to bring you an exciting new chapter every week. Uncover a new mystery in June's Journey every Thursday.
comments: I enjoy the game, the storyline and graphics. Like other have noted, not having stored items count towards your flowers seems odd. It's difficult to get compasses at times to open land - sometimes I have literally played about 1500 in points and got only one compass - particularly when having to play a completed scene over and over to just get enough stars to buy something. Which is another thing - I thought 36000 was a lot, then it was 38000, now 72000! Have to spend a lot of money to advance.

Love the many different aspects of the game...*the 'seek n find to gain points, increasing your coin level so you can *buy (houses, animals...), to increase your PRESTIGE, (the flowers you earn level up), *creating your own island! The *story line, following June from level to level! You don't have to make in app purchases; alternative ways to raise your coins to keep active until you meet your goals! You can also *follow JJ on Facebook!! My favorite game!!!

I like the varied parts to the game- mystery, puzzles, hidden items, building. The characters are realistic, not cartoon-like. I have had no glitches/bugs and the buttons to change scenes work easily. I was a bit confused about game play at the first scene but I went to the information and it became more clear. There are many layers to this game.

The game is fun but I have spent too much money to gain power ups, energy and gems go get farther in the game. The % you win for each seen you play to earn stars isn't equal to how well you play. It only gives you 10% increase when you "finish" a "scene" even if you get a perfect. If I get a perfect I should be earning more than 8-10% for playing great. Lots of improvements are needed.

I enjoy this game. The graphics are well done (I did find one typo but in this day and age that isn't bad) and the game play enjoyable. It is relaxing for me. I was also very impressed at the quick response to my inquiry about something that was actually me forgetting an aspect of game play about storing items. I had my answer in one day. I honestly wasn't that confident that something like a game maker would be that attentive to my dumb question. Good job!

title: Gentle Wakeup Pro - Sleep, Alarm Clock & Sunrise
description:
Wake up gently and relaxed every day
Slowly increasing light and sound in the morning will help you out of any deep sleep and let your body prepare for waking up.

Fall asleep faster
Slowly decreasing light and natural sound in the evening will lull you to sleep. A sleep aid slows down your breathe.

Sleep better through the night
Soothing sounds from nature or home at a low volume will help you to stay asleep.

***** Get all premium functions and updates free for life *****
The Pro Version requires a one-time payment. If you prefer you can test the app first. You can purchase a single premium feature or a subscription to all features, alternatively you can download the free version at: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.changemystyle.gentlewakeup

Pro Users get:
✓ Alarm premium features
✓ Night Mode premium features
✓ Power Nap premium features
✓ Sleep Timer premium features
✓ Soft Light premium features
✓ Weather Forecast premium features
✓ Countdown premium features
✓ No Advertisements
✓ All future features free for life

Features: 
✓ Alarm clock: Fully functional free alarm clock with repeat alarms and snooze function.
✓ True sunrise: The device changes colors from red to yellow like a real sunrise.
✓ Gentle sounds: Wake up with different natural sounds, instrumental music or your own favorite sounds.
✓ Big nightstand clock: A sleep clock that shows digital time and wake up time at night and can play sleep music to help you get to sleep faster.
✓ Power napping: Take a power nap during the day and wake up refreshed and with new energy after 20 min.
✓ Sleep timer: Easily fall asleep in the evening with a sunset and decreasingly gentle sounds (ASMR).
✓ Sleep aid: Helps to slow down your breathing to get you asleep faster and more relaxed. Set timer for the speed that you wish to decrease from.
✓ Sleeping sounds: Sleep better with background sounds! Choose from sounds like rain, wind, crickets or white noise. It also supports all sleep cycles like light sleep, deep sleep and REM sleep.
✓ Weather and clothes: The weather forecast with clothing symbols that always recommends the right clothing for today\'s weather. For rain, snow, sun and hot or cold – this app will recommend the right clothes to wear.
✓ Beautiful Countdowns:Count the number of days, weeks, and even minutes until your next holiday, birthday party or any other event you need to remember. Choose from over 100 beautifully designed counters and share them with your friends.
✓ Brightness adjustment: Brightness is smartly adjusted to not blind you in the night.
✓ Individual wake up: Get woken up without disturbing your partner.
✓ Easy and intuitive: All main features can be accessed by icons directly on the main screen.
✓ Soft torch light: Use the soft light to find something in the night without waking up anyone else while you find what you need.
✓ Portrait and landscape: Your device can be placed in portrait or landscape mode on your nightstand or bedside table.
✓ Autostart: The app can start automatically even if you close it. No additional battery consumption.
✓ Skip next alarm: Skip a repeating alarm in case you need to wake up earlier. Now you will be at no risk of forgetting to turn alarm on again.
✓ Custom repeat options: Repeat alarms every second monday, every second day or set specific calendar days to coincide with you work shifts.
✓ Guided Meditation: Fall asleep with guided relaxation and guided sleep meditation (english). Wake up with mindfulness.

Prevent sleep disorders
Gentle sleep sounds and light may help with sleeping disorders caused by any cause such as: stress, jet lag, depression, migraine, headache, motivation, tinnitus, insomnia, burn-out, autism, PTSD, anxiety disorder, ADHD, mental disorder. Please note that the app is not a medical product.

recentChanges: Bugfixes Countdowns
comments: Amazing. I love how the latest update gives you simple easy to use beginner options for the functions but it still retains the full level of customisation for every detail and control over almost every aspect of your alarm, timer or any one of the other functions. The wealth of tools provided here is worth every penny and I highly recommend it. After using this app for more than a year I still have only scratched the surface of how it can help. It really does help. Thanks Dr. Love it.
Just paid for the pro version because its been a great app for me. The intro video is well done and informative. Fully recommend.

title: Track Your Hearing
description:
Altersbedingter Hörverlust (Presbyakusis) ensteht durch alters- und lärmbedingte Veränderungen im Innenohr und in der Hörrinde des Gehirns. Bei vielen Menschen entsteht Presbyakusis schon im Alter von ca. 40-50 Jahren und nimmt über das Alter hinweg stetig zu. Bereits ungefähr 50% der über 80-Jährigen unserer Bevölkerung werden mit mindestens einer leichten Form von Presbyakusis diagnostiziert. Oft führt dies dazu, dass die Betroffenen Schwierigkeiten haben, einem Gespräch zu folgen und das Gegenüber zu verstehen. Besonders in Situationen mit vielen Nebengeräuschen wie zum Beispiel in einem Restaurant oder am Bahnhof oder wenn das Gegenüber undeutlich spricht, wird das Verstehen von Sprache umso anstrengender und teilweise fast unmöglich. Oft berichten betroffene Personen, dass sie durch die Anstrengung schnell ermüden und beispielsweise Mühe haben, die lauten Nebengeräusche auszublenden und sich nur auf das Gegenüber zu konzentrieren. 
Die Folgen von Hörverlust schwanken also stark je nach Situation, in der man sich befindet (z.B. im lauten Restaurant oder in einer sehr ruhigen Umgebung) und beeinträchtigen über den Tag hinweg mal stärker und mal schwächer. Weitere Gründe für Schwankungen können aber auch die Tageszeit, die aktuelle Tätigkeit, die aktuelle Stressempfindung und vieles mehr sein. Viele Menschen können eine gute Einschätzung dieser Schwankungen abgeben und den Zeitverlauf aus dem Gedächtnis rekonstruieren - eine exakte Messung dieser Schwankungen ist damit aber nicht gegeben. Eine systematische Erfassung des Hörverlusts und ihrer Schwankungen im Einfluss auf das Sprachverstehen über mehrere Wochen war bislang noch nicht möglich.
Mit diesem Forschungsprojekt wollen wir eine Möglichkeit bieten, die individuellen Schwankungen des Hörvermögens mittels einer Smartphone-App zu erfassen. Mit Hilfe Ihres Smartphones können Sie die Schwankungen Ihres Hörvermögens und deren Folgen systematisch messen und herausfinden, wie diese mit Ihrem Tagesablauf und Ihren Aktivitäten zusammenhängen. Über die Internetseite können Sie den Verlauf Ihrer eigenen Daten einsehen und gegebenenfalls mit Ihrem behandelnden Arzt oder Therapeuten besprechen.
Mit Ihrer Teilnahme unterstützen Sie unser Forschungsprojekt, die Schwankungen des Hörvermögens, dessen Ursachen und Wirkung besser zu verstehen.


Über das Team

TrackYourHearing wurde von der Tinnitus Research Initiative (TRI), dem Institut für Datenbanken und Informationssysteme (DBIS) der Universität Ulm und der Forschungsgruppe Neuroplastizitäts- und Lernforschung des gesunden Alterns (HAB LAB) der Universität Zürich entwickelt. Das Team besteht aus: 
M. Sc. Johannes Schobel (DBIS, Universität Ulm)
B. Sc. Robin Kraft (DBIS, Universität Ulm)
B. Sc. Robin Zöller (DBIS, Universität Ulm)
M. Sc. Tim Mohring (DBIS, Universität Ulm)
Dipl. Inf. Jochen Herrmann (DBIS, Universität Ulm)
Prof. Martin Meyer (HAB LAB, Universität Zürich)
Dr. des. Nathalie Giroud (HAB LAB, Universität Zürich)
M. Sc. Patrick Neff (HAB LAB, Universität Zürich)
M. Sc. Ira Kurthen (HAB LAB, Universität Zürich)
M. Sc. Laura Jagoda (HAB LAB, Universität Zürich)
M. Sc. Pia Neuschwander (HAB LAB, Universität Zürich)
Prof. Dr. Manfred Reichert (DBIS, Universität Ulm)
Rüdiger Pryss (DBIS, Universität Ulm)
Dr. Winfried Schlee (Tinnitus Research Initiative)

Wenn Sie Fragen, Feedback oder Anregungen zu dem Projekt haben, kontaktieren Sie uns bitte unter info@trackyourhearing.org.

title: Wood Block Puzzle - Free Classic Block Puzzle Game
description:
Wood Block Puzzle - Free Classic Block Puzzle Game, which also named Qblock is a classic addictive wooden style block puzzle game. Qblock challenges you to fit blocks of different shapes into a 10×10 grid. Wood Block Puzzle (Qblock) is a real classic, no time limit and totally free elimination game. Play Wood Block Puzzle - Free Classic Block Puzzle Game (Qblock) everyday, find the brand new combo mode in this classic block puzzle game.

How to Play Wood Block Puzzle - Free Classic Block Puzzle Game (Qblock) :
✓💪Drag and drop blocks into 10×10 grid
✓💪Fill the blocks with a row or column to eliminate them
✓💪Game will be over if there is no room on the board for given blocks
✓💪Blocks CAN'T be rotated
✓💪Reward scores for each step and every row or column of blocks you eliminated 
✓💪Get as many scores as you can to become the best block crush at Wood Block Puzzle - Free Classic Block Puzzle Game!

✓💪Truly enjoy the fun of puzzle game: NO wifi needed
✓💪Pure game environment: NO time limit
✓💪Innovation in the classics: Provide a grid to place a temporarily unwanted block
✓💪Brand New combo mode: 4 times or more combo will cause a round of shaking
✓💪Brisk game sound effects 
✓💪Quick to understand rules, easy to control
✓💪Elaborate interface: wooden style gets you close to nature.
✓💪Constantly update the various shapes of blocks, classic and challenging
✓💪Simple and addictive! 
✓💪Support game scores recording, support friend rankings, come and find our more services at Wood Block Puzzle - Free Classic Block Puzzle Game!

Wood Block Puzzle - Free Classic Block Puzzle Game (Qblock) also offers: 
✓💪Wood Block Puzzle - Free Classic Block Puzzle Game which also named Qblock is a classic simple game but is full of challenges. Qblock has its own logic skills and placement strategies, whether it is the very first or later move, each step determines whether you can get high scores. 
✓💪Share Wood Block Puzzle - Free Classic Block Puzzle Game (Qblock) with your friends, spend leisure time together and get close to each other!

recentChanges: Thanks for playing Wood Block Puzzle.  Let's enjoy the Halloween theme! At this new version, we'll try to offer you a better user experience. Improved user experience.
comments: Been playing this game for a couple of months now and still enjoying it. Ads are very short and do not interrupt gameplay. You can also opt for the ad free version. I personally especially like the challenge levels and the opportunity to watch full ads in order to earn rotations which can be saved and help loads if there are no suitable spaces left. A great game. No complaints at all 🏆

Love the game! However, to earn extra rotators you have to watch commercials. Sometimes many many commercials. The commercials are redundant. Based on your online searches, the commercials are geared to your interests. But if you enjoy watching American Girl 5 maybe 10 times in a row, this might be the game for you. They also offer different wood block games and show you those commercials over and over and over again. You would think if they would be a little creative.

Great gamec- I initially liked this game. At first you could get a free rotator every 5 minutes plus a 30 second ad. Now I have to wait for a free rotator every 24 hours. I DO NOT RECOMMEND this game to anyone. I am part of a group of people who download games, test them, and grade them and pass our comments to them who then pass the recommendations on to everybody in the group and then we pass them on to our friends and family. I do not recommend this game in any way whatsoever.

I Love Puzzles!!! Been playing this game for about a year or so and it's always fun and challenging. I enjoy a challenge with games like this! I will continue playing it. Happy to see the feature added of being able to rotate the piece to fit where you want it. Cool! Thanks!! Continue with enhancing the app to be even greater! 🙂

Rubbish app, spent more time restarting app than playing it. The first few days it was fine but as I ran out of rotates I watched a couple of ad's, to get some more, the app never worked correctly after that. It just kept freezing up. Was fun to play but since there are several versions I might try another block game

title: White Noise Sleep Sounds, Relax, Meditate
description:
Recommended as a miracle for better sleep! Find out why the world is sleeping better with White Noise. Features ambient sounds of the environment to help you relax during the day and sleep great at night. 

Do you have trouble going to sleep? Are you traveling on a plane and need a quick power nap? Does your newborn baby wake up in the middle of the night? There are numerous benefits to using White Noise:

•	Helps you sleep by blocking distractions
•	Relaxes and reduces stress
•	Pacifies fussy and crying babies
•	Increases focus while enhancing privacy
•	Soothes headaches and migraines
•	Masks tinnitus (ringing of the ears)

You can set the timer and put your app in background or turn off the screen. At the end of the time, the sound fades gently and the application closes by itself. So you do not have to worry about closing the app if you fall asleep.

title: Jabra Sound+
description:
Jabra Sound+ app
The Jabra Sound+ app is the perfect companion for your Jabra headphones – adding extra features and enabling you to personalize the way you use your Jabra headphones. Jabra Sound+ currently supports;
•	Jabra Elite 45e, 45h, 65e, 65t, 75t, 85t, 85h, Active 45e, Active 65t, Active 75t
•	Jabra Evolve 65e, 65t
•	Jabra Evolve2 65, 85 

An app experience that’s made for you
Today we use our headphones more than ever, and in very different environments – at work, on the train, working out, walking, driving, and more. To perform optimally, your headset may need different settings activated for each of these situations. 
For this purpose, we created “Moments” – predefined configurations to suit different moments of your day. All the Moments are customizable to cover your unique preferences, and with future updates.

Choose your favorite voice assistant – Google or Amazon Alexa*
With a single touch instantly access your phone’s voice assistant, directly from your headphones.

Personalize your music
Customize your sound with the music equalizer. Choose a predefined setting or fine-tune your audio using the 5-band equalizer.

SmartSound - automatically adapts your headset to your surroundings
SmartSound analyzes your sound environment and automatically applies your personalized audio using Moments in Sound+. **

ANC for blocking ambient noise 
With ANC (Active Noise Cancellation) you can reduce the amount of disruptive noise you hear from your surroundings. **
 
Hear the world around you 
Adjust how much of the outside world you’d like to hear when using your headphones. **
 
Superior call experience 
Modify your call settings to suit your preferences.
 
Battery status
Track your headphone’s battery status with a simple, visual indicator in the app.
 
Wireless updates
Always keep your headphones updated with the wireless update feature 
 
Activity tracking
Track your activity progress (only available for the Jabra Elite Active 65t).
 
2-year warranty
Register your headphones using the Jabra Sound+ app to activate your 2-year warranty against damage from water and dust. ***
 
 
*  Amazon registration required and dependent on headset compatibility
** Certain features, such as ANC, SmartSound and HearThrough are headphone dependent.
*** For the Elite headphones

comments: I'd recommend a way to disconnect the headphones from the app, or maybe see what your headset is connected to, or set priority of connection. Often I connect to my pc and phone. Use the connection to my pc all day then want to watch netflix on my phone in bed. Guess what, pc is still in control, but you can't kill the connection from the app, so I have to run down to my desktop or I can't hear my phone.

I just bought the Evolve 75e product. Not sure why it isn't supported on this app. Would be nice if it would be so I could update firmware and manage my device. The product is great, great sound and easy to setup and use. Update: In the app if you don't connect a device you can't get into the about section of the app, or at least I am not seeing any way to get to about.

After rocking the Active 65t I bought the 75t this summer. Love them, and since a week there's Active Noise Cancelation too! The app is great and has improved massively, less crashes and like every other earphone maker should have: an equalizer! One thing I'd like to suggest: There are a few default "Moments", like My Moments, Commute and Focus. I'd like to be able to have different ANC profile and attach them to the different Moments. In my home the noise is different from the noise in my car, so is it possible to add custom ANC profiles to the different Moments? That would be awesome! Keep up the great work! That's why I didn't switch to other headphones/earbuds ;-)

Jabra Elite 85h: Connection was very easy and fast. The app has a neat and tidy design. All options are easily accessible and understandable. The EQ works well and I love the option to be able to turn off the Voice-Playback when changing modes. I haven't experienced any problems so far. Will update this review if and when necessary.

Since the last update when I open the app is stuck on the "choose your headset from the list" screen. I choose my headset (75t) and go to Bluetooth settings (where they are already paired). I close the app and open again and im back on the menu to choose headset with no way back to the welcome page. Iv tried reinstalling and repairing. Tried with my second phone with no issues.

title: White Noise Sleep Aid
description:
Many doctors and sleep specialist recommend sound machines for a better and more refreshing sleep. White Noise Sleep Aid features soothing ambient sounds to help you fall asleep faster and stay asleep all night. It washes out annoying and distracting sounds to help you rest. Great for people who have trouble sleeping, need a quick nap, or trying to sleep in a noisy environment. It's perfect for upset or crying babies too!

* Improves sleep by drowning out distracting noises
* Masks tinnitus / ringing in the ears
* Helps meditation and relieves stress
* Soothes and pacifies distraught infants 


TONS OF SOUNDS

The sound catalog contains 40 relaxing sounds ranging from natural sounds to mechanical sounds to drones. Including rain, streams, beach, wind, mechanical rhythms, forests, crackling fires, white noise and variants, multiple drones, and many more.


APPLICATION FEATURES

* 40 seamlessly looped sounds ranging from natural sounds to mechanical sounds to drones
* Runs in background so you can still use your phone's alarm
* Quickly scroll through the sound thumbnails without losing the current playing sound
* High quality images for each sound so you quickly find what you want
* Works on Android phones and tablets

title: Thunderstorm Sounds for Sleep & Relaxation
description:
Thunderstorm sounds for sleep, relaxation, study & meditation. Soothing thunder & rain ambience for relaxation & natural stress relief.

Imagine you are in your warm and cosy bed listening to the ambient sounds of rumbling thunder and rain while you gently drift off to sleep, or you can play this in the background while you study or meditate so that your mind is calm and clear. Let the distant cracking thunder and rainstorm sounds create a beautiful ambience for relaxation.

This app is ideal for people who are tired, stressed, with insomnia and had a hard day of work. You will relax with smoothing music, beautiful songs used to relax and remove stress. Close your eyes, put on the headphones (For better result) and choose one of the sounds and relax or sleep better. Very beautiful collection of instrumental music for you to relax and let your forgot all tension and worries, just listen to this very silent music and relax.

You can relax and sleep with sleeping sounds, nature sounds, rain sounds, meditation sounds, ocean sounds, sea waves sounds, tinnitus sounds, waterfall sounds, baby sounds, baby lullabies, lullaby, relaxing sleep sounds, relaxing baby sleep sounds, Relaxing Spa Music, Piano Sounds, Sleep Relaxing Music, Sleep Relaxing Sounds, Tropical Sounds, Whale Sounds, Dolphin Sounds, Christms Sounds, brain Waves Sounds and white noise and much more. Enjoy the high quality sleep sounds

Take a deep breath. Release your stress. Prepare yourself to relax and meditate with the best selection of HD Meditation Music that will help you find inner peace and calmness.

Highlight features :-
---------------------
★ Select the song by clicking music icon at bottom of the screen
★ Select time slot to listen your favorite music
★ Selection among instruments and change at anytime
★ You can take control over volume just by dragging left and right seek bar on the screen.
★ Very simple UI and easy to understand.
★ Relaxation music for deep sleep, baby sleep and stress relief!
★ Excellent relaxation melodies with instrumental sounds!
★ Options for setting different time intervals!
★ Exquisite graphic design and intuitive controls!
★ Suitable for all generations of users!
★ Changes of image wih every music which gives new UI every time
★ Auto off music when timer ends
★ Perfect atmosphere to do mindfulness, kabbalah, reiki, taichí, yoga.
★ Soothing sounds to go to sleep with mp3 quality
★ Beautiful HD images to accompany the ambient sound and create perfect moments
★ Background music play

Our sounds to sleep free will not leave you indifferent. The ambient noise disappears and improve your health while you enjoy the music for meditation and sleep that we have prepared for you.

title: Relaxing Sleep Music
description:
In today’s hectic lifestyle, the pressure with which one hits the bed is unimaginable. Sleeping with sirens in your head is a sign of the decline of mental health leading to future complications. 

Relaxing sleep music is ideal for fatigue, stress, insomnia and sore nerves. It works great when you study, sleep, meditate, read, yoga and stay in the spa. It also works for children and babies. Listening to relaxing melodies reduces stress, improves concentration and relieves tinnitus.

Download the application and make your day free from stress and tension. Listen to relaxing music and melodious sounds, relax your mind and soul. A large collection of relaxing sounds and melodies will help you to calm down and rest.

With this application on your phone you can enjoy relaxing music and soothing melodies wherever you are and whenever you want. Playing soothing music when you sleep at night is the best way to have a restful sleep and an effective rest.

Put on the headphones, close your eyes and feel like in the spa.

● High quality sound,

Music for meditation:

Many people suffer from tinnitus that can be eliminated by listening to relaxing music.

title: Wysa: stress, depression & anxiety therapy chatbot
description:
Imagine a mood tracker, mindfulness coach, anxiety helper, and mood-boosting buddy, all rolled into one. Wysa, your happiness buddy is that friendly and caring chatbot. Wysa is packed with daily spiritual meditation that improves mental health and is also a perfect way to bond over family meditation. Always there for you when you need someone to talk to, Wysa helps you keep track of your mood with friendly chats and helps fight stress and anxiety with its proven techniques and calming meditation and mindfulness audios. Checking in with Wysa regularly will improve your emotional health so you can track your happiness and mood. Talk to Wysa now and psy yourself up to fight off stress. Also, Wysa has mental health assessment with depression and anxiety tests.

Wysa is your AI friend that you can chat with for free. Talk to the cute penguin or use its free mindfulness exercises for effective anxiety relief, depression and stress management. Its therapy based techniques and conversations make for a very cute and calming therapy chat app whether you're looking to cope better with mental disorders, to manage stress or to boost your mental health.

Wysa, your happiness buddy, will support you through the big and small anxieties of life by using science as a foundation to strengthen your mental health. Research-backed, widely used techniques of CBT, DBT, Yoga and meditation are employed to support you with stress, anxiety, deep sleep, loss and other mental health and wellness needs.

If you are dealing with stress, anxiety and depression or coping with low self-esteem, then talking to Wysa can help you relax and get unstuck - it’s empathetic, helpful, and will never judge. You will overcome your mental health obstacles, through empathetic conversation and free CBT therapy based technique. So, pour your heart out to your happiness buddy, Wysa as your identity will remain anonymous and your conversations are privacy protected.

Used around the clock and trusted by 500,000 people, Wysa is an emotionally intelligent chatbot that uses AI to react to the emotions you express. Unlock tools and techniques that help you cope with challenges in a fun, conversational way. For extra support, you can avail guidance from a real human coach - a skilled psychologist who will take you through the advanced coaching sessions for your needs.

You can use Wysa to rewire your mind to improve your emotional health. Fight off depression or get stress relief using cbt techniques and guided sleep meditations for optimal sleep. Here’s a look at what you can use Wysa for 👇

👂 Vent and talk through things or just reflect on your day

💪 Practice CBT (Cognitive Behavioral Therapy) and DBT techniques to build resilience in a fun way

📝 Use one of 40 conversational coaching tools which helps in dealing with Stress, Anxiety, Depression, Panic Attacks, Worry, Loss, or Conflict

💆🏻 Relax, focus and sleep peacefully with the help of 20 mindfulness meditation exercises

93% of the people who talk to Wysa find it and the tools helpful:

- Build confidence, reduce self-doubt and improve your self-esteem: core meditation and mindfulness, visualisation, confidence visualisation techniques, advanced mindfulness for self-esteem.

- Manage anger: mindfulness meditation exercises for compassion, calming your thoughts and practice breathing

- Manage anxious thoughts and anxiety: deep breathing, techniques for observing thoughts, visualization, and tension relief.

- Tired? Get a burst of energy! Visualisation and meditation exercises to increase positivity and get blissful sleep, quick yoga and physical exercises to get active

- Dealing with worry: observe mindfulness, resolving technique, challenge negativity, practice breathing techniques

- Manage conflict at work, school or in relationships: special mindfulness and visualization techniques like empty chair exercise, gratitude meditation, exercises to build skills in having difficult conversations
