comments: You remember 1942 on your Commodore C64? This is nothing like it. All enemies and bullets seem to be magnetic and you basically have no chance to 'win' this game. This is another game that's just trying to squeeze some money out of the player for exactly zero value. They even offer airplanes for $49.99. You can buy a proper game for that kind of money. Ten cents would be too much and I'm sorry for everyone spending money on this

To the developer of this game, you need to fix the score of the PvP game it is not right .No matter how you fight the opponent by looking the time and the score it suddenly the other opponent had a higher score even if you are ahead. How can you explain that sometimes the score is right and you can tell that you are losing because the end of the game its just stuck that you cant even move. Very bad pvp games.

Had 300.000 gold, 3150 gems when they just disappeared when I started playing today. Thats a big, big flaw that needs to be corrected fast. It takes some time building up alot of gems and gold. A bug like that is unacceptable. I am very disappointed. As of 3Sept cannot access PVP mode, special event mode, as well as other game play modes really???, especially when it says server not available. Your E-mail for support is not valid. Fix these bugs.

At first, the game is great. Good old 1942, however after longer play you realise how unbalanced the game & reward system are. If you don't buy blue diamonds for real money, forget about getting high quality planes/weapons. Playing long hours only gives you minimum coins or diamonds (if you buy them for coins). But the most annoying is the lucky wheel - 1 ticket costs 5000 coins and you usually (8\10) win only 10 diamonds which is minimum. Too many more negatives to mention, hence 2stars.

I love this game but this is the fourth time it has crashed on me and taken over a years worth of watching videos to build up my aircrafts. I'm guessing this is what happens when you do not spend money on the app.

title: Brain It On! - Physics Puzzles
description:
Deceptively challenging physics puzzles for your brain!

Draw shapes to solve challenging physics puzzles. They're not as easy as they look. Care to give one a try?

◆ Dozens of brain busting physics puzzles, with more being added all the time
◆ Compete with your friends for the Brain It On! crown
◆ Multiple ways to solve each puzzle, can you find the best solution?
◆ Share your unique solutions and compare with your friends

All the levels can be unlocked for free by earning stars in previous levels. You can always find dozens of new player created free levels each day on the community screen. You can also purchase the game to remove all ads, unlock all hints, unlock levels early, and unlock the level editor.

Please note: purchasing the "No Popup Ads" option just removes the ads between levels, purchasing the "Full Game" will also remove the ads to get hints.

If you like this game, please rate it and leave a comment. As an indie developer your support is greatly appreciated. Thank you for your help! If you don't like something in the game, please email me at support@brainitongame.com and tell me why. I want to hear your feedback and comments so I can continue to make this game better.

You can find me on Twitter at @orbitalnine, see the latest news on the Facebook page at http://www.facebook.com/brainitongame, or get all the details on the website: http://brainitongame.com

I hope you enjoy Brain It On!

comments: You will probably give up on some levels because you have no clue. Might even watch a hint still be unsure. Always room for improvement! It's rewarding when you figure it out. The physics overall work well, I had a few issues where the peices glitch through eachother. But it's rare and just requires a restart. No big deal. The levels start off easy, now I'm skipping some levels because I can't figure it out. If you want a challenge. Try this game. It's a lot of fun.

I love this game. Starting off drawing shapes to move balls around the screen, the game developes, becoming a balancing act of inginuity, precision and skill, without adding any additional mechanics. The level design is tight, teaching ideas organically, without becoming impossible, but hArd COrE GaMerS can enjoy trying over and over for full stars. The ads aren't infuriating, and although the objects can clip, it's rare enough to be funny, instead of infuriating.

"Gravity, to Copernicus, is the nostalgia of things to become spheres." - Annie Dillard ....... Sometimes an itch comes along that you just have to scratch. Impressed so far - still rather early in my experience of the game - but thinking a stylus would be quite helpful. Thanks to the developers.

It used to be an rxcellent brain trainer that fotces you to think outside the box. Now it's broken because it wants to force use of "Google Play Games" library to "enhance experience" with useless tie-in with farcebook and other useless social stuff. Uninstall as broken. I corrected, it wasn't "some games library" it's "Google Play Games". It forces me to the Google Play app to install it. I can provide screenshot.

I love it! It does not rush you, if you get it wrong you haven't wasted hours, only seconds.At the moment I feel educated, and with a greater appreciation for physical objects. On Premium you can delete it when you get angry, then reinstall months later unchanged, no penalty. You need a precision stylus if you use it on mobile phone (I must get one!) . The 'hints' and 'restart' buttons are badly placed for right handers, you can accidentally press them during play, I wish I could move them.

comments: This app is absolutely incredible. It has so many drawing and you can create your own drawing. On my second day I colored 5 drawings already. This app is just fantastic. I always get new awards. However, there are so many adds. Which I do not like. I absolutely hate it. Although, all the adds do remove but you have to pay money. It was a fantastic app. I really love the app. I would be shock if anyone rated this a one star. I just cannot believe that.💙💙💙😀

Really good, I was having problems with a other paint by number and it got a little boring so I decided to get this one. This never gets boring for me and has so many puzzles. I also like how it is divided in different genres, it makes it easier to find what I want to do and find specific things that may be hard to see. There is just one problem: I allowed my camera and It still won't let me make custom art, very sad but it's only one problem which I can get from other pixel art apps so it's ok.

Honestly, this game has to be one of my favorite apps in my phone! It just makes me feel so creative and happy. When I'm a little bit sad or maybe just bored, I play this game and it just makes me feel so happy! Also, just to point out, when the other pictures, like, is kinda special, you can just watch an ad and its free! Well, despite the other option which is to get the premium, its fine! So, I am highly reccomending this game to kids, teens, adults, every age!

I absolutely love this game. There are many kinds of drawings to color . I love that the game has different categories to chose from. If you want to color a special drawing it takes 1 add to get it, Well for me it does. I color at least 15 drawings a day. This game is a calming game and a relaxing game. This game is a great game to play in quarantine too. THE END

I love this game, dont get me wrong. Though there is this issue that happens quite a lot when I'm coloring in pictures. I'll be filling/coloring in a picture of something and then there will be a color missing. And I cant find it even when I click the bulb to find it it cant, and then I cant finish the coloring page. Hope you can fix that. 😐

title: Sound App DEMO - Nature Sounds
description:
The 'Sound App - Nature Sounds' app plays relaxing sounds like nature sounds, water sounds, rain sounds, animal sounds, ... This app can be used for relaxation, sleep improvement, sound therapy, ...

This is a DEMO version of the the 'Sound App - Nature Sounds' app and contains a set of 4 sounds. This allows you to try the app before you buy the full version. Please buy the full version of the "Sound App - Nature Sounds" to unlock all sounds. Thank you.

The 'Sound App - Nature Sounds' can be used for:
- relaxation
- sound enrichment
- sound therapy
- reducing contrast with annoying sounds in the environment
- improving sleep
- tinnitus therapy
- tinnitus retraining therapy (TRT)
- stress management
- ...

Nature sounds included:
- waterfall *
- river
- rain
- sea
- birds *
- crickets
- pink noise *
- brown noise
- bonfire
- rain forest *
- thunderstorm
(Sound marked with * are available in the demo version. The other sounds are included in the full version).

Using the Sound App app is extremely easy: just a select a sound and it will play continuously in the background. You can continue to use your device while the sounds are playing. Sounds continue to play when the screen is off.

High quality audio fragments are used and loops are seamless, so there are no annoying gaps during playback.

Enjoy this DEMO version of the Sound App!

comments: This is the absolute best slots game, that I have ever played. The graphics, in the games are unique and the wins play better than all so far. Played for months, spent probably around $1,000 on packages...having fun. I understand it is a play-to-win game and so I had no problem making the occasional purchase - but recently their greed has just gotten to be too much. The way the game is programmed to purposely work against you to force more purchases has taken any fun or sense of the excitement out of the game. They aren't even coy about it; it's just blatant and irritating. I won't be spending another penny on any Playtika games.

Here we go again with the app doing more cool features which causes loading issues that go on for months. Always the same advice to uninstall and reinstall which does nothing. It seems this always happens close to tournaments ending so you can't reach the grand prize. Also too many contests going on at the same time, so you are being forced to play. Just what are these "cool features?"

Everything in this online casino is about trying to get you to spend money on air. Everytime you switch games you have to navigate through 6 ads begging for money. Enough is enough. One ad is ok two is tollerable but so many ads begging for money is insane. If I was to spend money at an online casino it would be one where I have a chance to win real money. Sorry ceasers but your online casino is well below par in my view.

Not playing anymore until the issue is fixed.

Hi! I am reviewing this game I gave it a five stars originally. I spend a lot of money every month on this game and enjoy playing it. However you don't always get the treasure boxes, the correct amount of bingo cards, and when you collect your food items the percentage doesn't go up the movie up to the next level. I also participate the treasure chess competition and a lot of the times it doesn't count all my treasure chest which is frustrating. I have updated the newer version.

I really love this game and it is super fun and I love the club I lead but after spending well over $100 of my real money on the game it is frustrating that the game just sometimes kicks you out of matches. Yes i get the bingo tickets back but all the powerups that were used are never returned. I have seen where someone else wrote a review with the same complaint and was told to clear their cache... No I am sorry this is happening to many people and I am over it. Your issue not ours, fix it.
